CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed device attestation
CurrentVersion.description:
Enhancing Windows compliance policy - device health: adding 5 additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 - using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, Firmware protection, Virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection. 

This item was incorrect and has been replaced with 387499

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed device attestation
OldVersion.description: Enhancing Windows compliance policy - device health: adding 5 additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 - using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, Firmware protection, Virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Online Archive for Shared Mailboxes
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Add Online Archive for Shared Mailboxes in Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Online Archive for Shared Mailboxes
OldVersion.description:
,
Add Online Archive for Shared Mailboxes in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message reminders
CurrentVersion.description:
,
When Outlook identifies that a user could have forgotten to respond to or follow up on an email message, it could bring that email back to the top of the inbox, marking it needing an action. A maximum of one email message can be brought to the top of the user's inbox at a time.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message reminders
OldVersion.description:
,
When Outlook identifies that a user could have forgotten to respond to or follow up on an email message, it could bring that email back to the top of the inbox, marking it needing an action. A maximum of one email message can be brought to the top of the user's inbox at a time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products. The release phase has been updated to show current standing.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
OldVersion.description: ,The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products. The release phase has been updated to show current standing.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
CurrentVersion.description: ,Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
OldVersion.description: ,Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the view, download, and delete experience of Teams meeting transcript files
CurrentVersion.description: We are streamlining the storage of meeting transcript files. Starting with this feature, all meeting transcript entry points in Teams app will point to the OneDrive for Business copy only. The rollout of this feature also improves the delete experience of the transcript for meeting organizers. Now, when a meeting organizer or co-organizer deletes the transcript in the Microsoft Teams app, this will delete both copies of the transcript (from OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online) at the same time. If the meeting organizer deletes the transcript from Stream, only the copy in OneDrive for Business will be deleted. At a later date to be announced, meeting transcripts will stop saving in Exchange Online altogether and all transcript storage will be standardized on OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
OldVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Generic Wired Headsets on Android
CurrentVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on Walkie Talkie.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Generic Wired Headsets on Android
OldVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on Walkie Talkie.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Right preview pane in the single line view aka column layout
CurrentVersion.description: Adding support to show the reading pane in the right when user selects column view.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Right preview pane in the single line view aka column layout
OldVersion.description: Adding support to show the reading pane in the right when user selects column view.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Creators and recipients can view, track, and sign their SharePoint eSignature requests in Approvals in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can track their SharePoint eSignature requests in the Approvals app in Teams. Users will be notified about new requests, updated about ongoing requests, and will be able to initiate signing within their flow of work in Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Creators and recipients can view, track, and sign their eSignature requests in Approvals in Teams
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to track their eSignature requests in the Approvals app in Teams. Users will be notified about new requests, updated about ongoing requests, and will be able to initiate signing within their flow of work in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
CurrentVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Transfer Teams calls to mobile calls
OldVersion.description: When using Teams on mobile phones, users can now transfer their ongoing Teams calls to the phone's native dialer, without any disruption or loss of context.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder tags on items in Search Folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Search Folders will now display a folder tag within the message list, indicating the folder to which each email belongs. This enhancement provides users with quick and easy access to contextual information, improving navigation and organization within their mailbox. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.
